CPMAddPackage(
    NAME spdlog
    GITHUB_REPOSITORY gabime/spdlog # v1.x
    GIT_TAG 8fb112158a64afe1bd58c82c06bf6a142c9b3823
    OPTIONS "SPDLOG_FMT_EXTERNAL ON"
    EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL YES)

ph_add_library(
    NAME ph_vendor_spdlog
    TYPE INTERFACE
    COMPILE_DEFINITIONS
        INTERFACE
        SPDLOG_NO_THREAD_ID
        SPDLOG_DISABLE_DEFAULT_LOGGER
        SPDLOG_ACTIVE_LEVEL=SPDLOG_LEVEL_TRACE
        SPDLOG_FUNCTION=""
    LINK_LIBRARIES SYSTEM INTERFACE spdlog)
